content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-87--83)
Consists of following entities:
- Three burner mining drills at positions (x=37.0, y=-85.0), (x=39.0, y=-85.0), and (x=41.0, y=-86.0)
- Collection chests at positions (x=36.5, y=-86.5), (x=39.5, y=-83.5), and (x=40.5, y=-87.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (x=35.5, y=-86.5) and (x=35.5, y=-85.5)

### Iron/Copper Mining Area at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (x=-28.0, y=-61.0)
- Stone furnace at position (x=-27.0, y=-58.0)
- Collection chest at position (x=-27.5, y=-59.5)
- Burner inserter at position (x=-26.5, y=-59.5)

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-10--6, y=-59)
Consists of following entities:
- Three burner mining drills at positions (x=-10.0, y=-59.0), (x=-8.0, y=-59.0), and (x=-6.0, y=-59.0)
- Collection chests at positions (x=-9.5, y=-57.5), (x=-7.5, y=-57.5), and (x=-5.5, y=-57.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (x=-6.5, y=-57.5), (x=-7.5, y=-56.5), (x=-4.5, y=-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting the drills

### Smelting Line at position(x=0-6, y=0)
Consists of following entities:
- Five stone furnaces at positions (x=0.0, y=0.0), (x=2.0, y=0.0), (x=4.0, y=0.0), (x=6.0, y=0.0)
- Input chests at positions (x=0.5, y=-2.5), (x=2.5, y=-2.5), (x=4.5, y=-2.5), (x=6.5, y=-2.5)
- Output chests at positions (x=0.5, y=2.5), (x=2.5, y=2.5), (x=4.5, y=2.5), (x=6.5, y=2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters for input/output handling
- Transport belt system connecting the furnaces

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5-4.5, y=17.5-27.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position (x=4.5, y=20.5)
- Boiler at position (x=-1.5, y=22.0)
- Offshore pump at position (x=-3.5, y=27.5)
- Pipe network connecting water and steam
- Electric pole network providing power

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to insert items without having them in inventory
- Check inventory contents before attempting to insert items into machines
- Ensure required items are collected/crafted before insertion attempts

### Errors with full storage containers
- Monitor chest capacities and empty them when close to full
- Add more storage capacity or faster item extraction when chests are consistently full

### Errors with machines running out of fuel
- Implement regular refueling cycles for all burner-type machines
- Keep coal supply chains operational and maintain adequate fuel reserves
